scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: Fredericksburg (Va.) Mayor's Court Judgments and Executions, 1825-1826, records in chronological order the proceedings of the Mayor's Court. Information found in proceedings include a brief summary of judgments in debt and criminal suits, executions, and warrants issued against individuals by the the court. Additional information found in proceedings include entries related to slaves and the selection of the election of mayor, councilmen, clerk of council, and other city officials. The volume includes an index that records the title of suits in alphabetical order. Entries record the date suit ended, title of suit, the date execution was issued, and whether the execution was satisfied.
